news.html: Two papers accepted to ECCV 2022 and two to IROS 2022/RAL! See y'all in parallel in Kyoto and Tel Aviv? :thinking:
Three papers accepted to CVPR 2022 jays! Thanks to my cool collaborators!
I am spending a year at the Carnegie Mellon University (The Robotics Institute, CMU Argo AI Center for Autonomous Vehicle Research) in Pittsburgh! Thanks to Deva Ramanan for hosting me!
I am giving an invited talk at the CVPR'21 JRDB workshop!
I was selected for a participation at the Robotics Science and Systems (RSS) 2020 Pioneers event!
We are organizing a workshop at ECCV'2020 "Tracking and its many guises"! Web-page
We are organizing a workshop on Multi-Object Tracking and Segmentation at CVPR'2020 in Seattle!

service.html: I am the main organizer of 6th BMTT MOTChallenge Workshop: Segmenting and Tracking Every Point and Pixel (ICCV'21) workshop!.
Reviewer for (machine learning, vision conferences) CVPR, ECCV, ICCV, BMVC, NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR; (robotics conferences) ICRA, IROS, RSS; (journals) IJCV, RAL, TPAMI
Co-organizer for workshops: 5th BMTT MOTChallenge Workshop: Multi-Object Tracking and Segmentation (CVPR'20), Tracking and its many guises (ECCV'20).
Super-honored to be on the ECCV'24 organization team!
I am in RSS Pioneers 2021 program committee!
